data.title: Early Dish Slow Orb Contest
data.description: Fight for Dish control early into the round with this easy, yet effective Slow Orb lineup.

data.title: Early A Main Wall + Slow Door Contest
data.description: Set up an aggressive play towards A Main early into the round with this combination of utility. Attackers will find it extremely difficult to successfully take A Main control.

data.title: Standard B Main Wall + Boost
data.description: Use this simple, but effective Barrier Orb lineup to stop Attackers from running out B Main. You can also boost up on your wall to play a powerful off-angle shown in the video.

data.title: A Drop Wall Lurk
data.description: Here's a great way to potentially catch enemy players off guard as they push into A Drop.

data.title: B Generator Wall Off Angle
data.description: Here's a Barrier Orb off angle wall setup for behind B Generator.
